verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Humble thyself in the sight of the Lord. (Echo)
Humble thyself in the sight of the Lord. (Echo)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And He (and He) will lift (will lift) you up, higher and higher.
And He (and He) will lift (will lift) you up.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
And He (and He) will lift (will lift) you up, up into heaven!
And He will lift you up.
